Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nippy \nippy\ adj. Pleasantly cold and invigorating; -- of weather conditions.
Syn: crisp, frosty, nipping, snappy. [WordNet 1.5]

nippy adj : pleasantly cold and invigorating; "crisp clear nights and frosty mornings"; "a nipping wind"; "a nippy fall day"; "snappy weather"; (`parky' is a British term) [syn: {crisp}, {frosty}, {nipping}, {snappy}, {parky}] [also: {nippiest}, {nippier}]
